sex.Description: biological sex of the animal, e.g., m or f

group.Description: experimental genotype assignment, KO = mutant missing C3aR1 or wt (wildtype, as found in the wild, not genetically altered)

litter_moniker.Description: grouping identifier for animals from the same litter

weight_ses-PND30.Description: weight during the adolescence scan, postnatal day 30

weight_ses-PND90.Description: weight during the adulthood scan, postnatal day 90

actual_age_in_days_PND30.Description: age in days during the adolescence scan, postnatal day 30

actual_age_in_days_PND90.Description: age in days during the adulthood scan, postnatal day 90

litter_size.Description: how many animals in the litter. can be informative for brain size in adolesence since determines milk availability
